alert.note: Alert for Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pierce, west central Brantley and northern Ware Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Manor, or 8 miles west of Waycross, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Blackshear, Boggy Bay, Jamestown, Pebble Hill and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
